definition: (fig.) punching bag
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Bao

sentences.english: Third category called" little wife" middle, be a yes-man, like a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 第三类叫“小媳妇型”中层，唯唯诺诺，像个受气包。

sentences.english: She's a doormat in the company, even the green hand can wrong her.
sentences.chinese: 她在公司就是个受气包，甚至新手也可以欺负她。

sentences.english: Speak out what you want to say, don't just like a doormat!
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是一个受气包，什么都不敢反抗。

sentences.english: So in the units we not only became jack, also become a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 所以在单位我们不但成了千斤顶，还成了受气包。

sentences.english: Even if their part was to have been a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 即使是他们的错误就在于一直在当受气包。

sentences.english: Shes born doormat, afraid of going against anything.
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是个受气包儿，什么事都不敢说个不字。

sentences.english: Every time there was a fight in the playground, he seemed to end up as the punchbag.
sentences.chinese: 每次操场上有人打架，最终他就好像成了受气包。

sentences.english: You are a real punching bag before her.
sentences.chinese: 在她面前，你是个十足的受气包。

sentences.english: You are plain doormat. Why couldn't you say "NO"?
sentences.chinese: 你真是个受气包儿。你怎么就不能说个“不”字呢？

sentences.english: If I were her, I wouldn't be her husband's doormat like that.
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是个受气包儿，什么事都不敢说个不字。

sentences.english: He is the opposite of most people who are sniveling bags of selfishness.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人都是自私的受气包，而他则恰恰相反。

definition: one who tries never to offend anybody
to be mistreated/to be bullied
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone
shrew/vixen
to bully
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
violent woman/shrew
young married woman/mistress/(fig.) punching bag/(old) child bride
lit. closed gourd/fig. enigma/complete mystery/taciturn person
Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)
witch/shrew/vixen
crybaby
devil incarnate (idiom)/fiend in human form
(coll.) meek and civil in public, but a tyrant at home
an awkward person/a difficult person to deal with
